summary: A man believes that his ex, shrink and colleagues are out to get him and that he's being followed by someone or something.
cast: Desmond Askew|Katheryn Winnick|J. Richey Nash|Michael Panes|Coleen Sexton|Deven May|Theo Hausen|Doug Wert|Della Askew|William Ryall|Adam LeFevre|Tony Cucci|R. Brandon Johnson|John O'Connor|Jim Ireland|Robert Gerard Larkin|Susan Porro
title: Fabled
